name: Danville_Horne
text:
Danville Horne
Danville Horne was the patriarch of the Horne family who founded a successful mercantile business that ultimately led to his family's influence in the town of Twin Peaks, Washington.
Biography
During the California gold rush, Horne established a successful mercantile company in San Francisco. By 1905, the business had reached Minnesota and Horne's son Orville traveled to Twin Peaks, Washington, where he founded Horne's General Store.
